summary: This plugin adds a spell called Soul Siphon. It\'s an Area Soul Trap spell for those mages bored of missing and/or having to spell every npc to farm soulgems.
descriptionHtml:
This plugin adds a spell called Soul Siphon. It\'s an Area Soul Trap spell for those mages bored of missing and/or having to spell every npc to farm soul-gems.

The Spell Tome: Soul Siphon will be available at any spell vendor when your Conjuration skill reaches lvl 25 or more. You will also be able to craft the spell tome at the Atronach Forge, as well as finding the recipe for it on random loot.


Also available at the Workshop, same name.
author: Fowk
